description: This meta shows you how to create an order using the biller code and the product Id

spec.country: This is the country attached to the service being bought e.g. if Service is Airtime and country is NG it means you are buying airtime in Nigeria.
spec.customer: This is an object with the name, email and phone number of the customer.
spec.amount: This is the amount for the service you would like to order.
spec.fields: This is an array of the id, quatity and value of the order
spec.reference: This is a unique reference passed by the developer to identify transactions on their end.
